original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL, the national ICT solutions provider, has partnered with Capitol Developers, a part of the Sanken Group and pioneer in the nation’s construction industry, to provide the Capitol TwinPeaks luxury mixed development project with SLT-MOBITEL Fibre and Smart Home services.

The Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) was signed recently between Imantha Wijekoon, Chief Business Officer, Consumer Business- SLT-MOBITEL, and Rohana Wannigama, Managing Director, Capitol Towers Ltd., in the presence of several other representatives from SLT-MOBITEL and Capitol Developers.

As part of the MOU, SLT-MOBITEL will provide cutting-edge fibre infrastructure connectivity for each TwinPeaks apartment unit, ensuring residents have access to ultra-fast, reliable, and uninterrupted internet connectivity for all their digital needs.

In addition, the mock apartment A3 on Level 12 of Tower 1 of the complex will be equipped with smart home services, showcasing opportunities for cutting-edge technology, enhanced security, convenience, and an overall superior quality of life. SLT-MOBITEL Smart Home solutions allow residents to control various aspects of their home, including lighting, security systems, and entertainment, through a single app on their mobile devices.
